articles.title: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Sequel Moving Ahead As Sony and Netflix Engage In Deal Talks - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The dealmaking comes as the runaway sensation lands on the list of the streamer's most-watched English-language films of all time — a feat few could have imagined.

articles.title: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Is Netflix’s Most-Watched Movie Ever With 236 Million Views, Beating ‘Red Notice’ - Variety
articles.description: 'KPop Demon Hunters' has become Netflix's most-streamed movie in history, beating 'Red Notice.'

articles.title: Lil Nas X Breaks Silence on Arrest and Felony Charges: ‘That Was F-cking Terrifying’ - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Lil Nas X breaks silence on his arrest after pleading not guilty to four felony charges for allegedly assaulting police officers.
